title: Sirena
description:
App to help view and count money of sold tickets for accounting.

It uses api to get data, i used MockApi to get some sample data.

The app creates a request to api when changing date or count of entries to load.

App counts total sum of money and separately total sum for highlighted items. {' '}Highlighted can be just a flag provided by api, or it can be computed depends of current data item.

App allows to show or hide table's columns.

App saves settings changes like Limit, date, visible table columns values in cookies.

Table fields saved in config, and any function can be attached to each field to change view of value (for ex, replace boolean 'true' to '+').

tech.main: React, React hooks, CRA, react-datepicker, Bootstrap, react-cookie.
